sqlMap.select: SELECT MI.MAT_NO MAT_NO, MI.MAT_ID MAT_ID, MI.MAT_NAME MAT_NAME, MI.OLD_NAME OLD_NAME, MI.BP_NAME BP_NAME, PRI.TYPE_NO MAT_TYPE_NO, PRI.STATE_NO MAT_STATUS_NO, POTI.OBJECT_TYPE_NAME MAT_TYPE_NAME, PSI.STATUS_NAME MAT_STATUS_NAME, SC.CODE_NAME MAT_UNIT_NAME, MI.MAT_UNIT_CODE MAT_UNIT_CODE, MI.MAT_DESCRIPTION MAT_DESCRIPTION FROM MAT_INFO MI, PROCESS_RUNNING_INFO PRI, PROCESS_OBJECT_TYPE_INFO POTI, PROCESS_STATUS_INFO PSI, SY_CODE SC WHERE MI.RUNNING_NO = PRI.RUNNING_NO(+) AND PRI.TYPE_NO = POTI.OBJECT_TYPE_NO(+) AND PRI.STATE_NO = PSI.STATUS_NO(+) AND MI.MAT_UNIT_CODE = SC.CODE_ID(+) AND MI.ACTIVITY = 1 AND MI.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
